import { useState } from "react" function Squares({value, onClick}){ return } export default function TicTacToe(){ const[squares,setSquares] = useState(Array(9).fill('')); const[isXturn,setIsXturn] = useState(true); return(
handleClick(0)} /> handleClick(1)} /> handleClick(2)} />
handleClick(3)} /> handleClick(4)} /> handleClick(5)} />
handleClick(6)} /> handleClick(7)} /> handleClick(8)} />
) }
